movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.actors: Morgan Freeman, Tim Robbins, Bob Gunton
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.
